other_tests.findings: Identified a novel missense mutation L658F in KHD of NPR-B in homozygous and heterozygous states in the patient and his parents, respectively.
The L658F mutant conferred normal binding affinity for C-type natriuretic peptide but impaired ligand-induced cGMP production.
The L658F mutant did not lead to significant cGMP production when treated with CNP.
